meanings.sent1: Eating fruits and vegetables can help you become heathier.
meanings.sent2: She chose the heathier option by going for a walk instead of watching TV.
meanings.sent3: The heathier banana challenged the cookie to a race.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as heathier as a field of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The fresh air made her feel heathier than ever before.

meanings.definition: Characterized by good health or physical well-being.
meanings.sent1: The heathier lifestyle included regular exercise and balanced meals.
meanings.sent2: He looked heathier after recovering from his illness.
meanings.sent3: The heathier cat enjoyed chasing butterflies in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The heathier glow of her skin was noticeable to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The heathier plants in the garden grew taller and stronger.
